full_text: @NathanAckerman_ Rodon not going anywhere makes me feel better about settling for Thor

Trade return aside, if David Robertson comes back to the Phillies and helps them to get back to the postseason for the first time since 2011, that will be a great story. 

He didn't do anything wrong in his first tenure with the team, his body just failed him. Now, he's healthy.

The Phillies have now added David Robertson and Brandon Marsh, but continue to shop for starting pitchers.

Sources say they've talked to the Red Sox about Nathan Eovaldi and Rich Hill, and to the Giants about Carlos Rodon. And still in conversation with the Angels on Syndergaard

They have to get Rodon or literally none of this makes sense. 

(The Marsh deal makes zero sense regardless)

Add Carlos Rodon, and you have the 2019 Nationals formula. Top-heavy lineup, a bullpen that‚Äôs fine, and three of the best starters in the game. Doesn‚Äôt matter if you barely squeak into the playoffs - Nola/Wheeler/Rodon gives you a really good chance to make a run.
